channel.title: XileSoft - ONE OF A KIND (Better then ScapeRune)
channel.description:
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/xilesoft.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"][FONT="Comic Sans MS"][B]Introduction[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
The XileSoft server is going to be great, because of it's great base. Final Devolution 2.7 - by Killamess. With Final Devolution 2.7, includes all the files to start coding onto the se rver. Adding timers, delays, and other variables. It also includes a class Constants which you can configure different parts of the server. Inside this class you can also add your own variables. At [B]XILESOFT INCORPORATE[/B] we strive to compete with the rest of the competetion, even Jagex. We can do this through creativity and getting every object, every npc, every button interactive with the user just like RuneScape.
[SIZE="5"][FONT="Comic Sans MS"][B]Features[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
Considering we strive for creativity, like said in the introduction, we will have many features in-game via interactive with limited bugs. Below lists some of the "creative features" we have added/will be adding.
[B]The official XileSoft progress bar:[/B]
[SIZE="5"][B][COLOR="Lime"]||||||||[/COLOR][COLOR="Red"]||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[B]Proof that we care:[/B] A staff needs to care about what they are programming. The code
[code]default: p.sendMessage("Were not gonna add this crap."); break;[/code]
Is not caring. Caring means going through every individual object and writing a code for each. Something as simple as making the object say "The door seems to be stuck" or something as advanced as starting hundreds of timers and getting the perfect delay. We are already almost 10% done in about 2 days.
[b]Never before seen...[/b] A server needs to have features that have never been added in another. Something that will attrack players toward your server instead of others. We have been working almost 24 hours straight on the project. Let us list our features that other servers don't have.
_____________________________________________
[B]Host[/B]
- Windows Server 2003 - 3.25GB RAM - 500GB Bandwith - Quad-Core Intel
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/vps.jpg[/img]
_____________________________________________ _____________________________________________
[B]Features Written by Me:[/B]
[ul] [*]Monkey Island [*]Monkey Island Demon's Minigame [*]Barrows Minigame [*]Bounty Hunter Minigame (Formerally PK Box) [*]Staff Zone [*]Loads and loads of extras [*]Blurite Gathering Minigame [*]Automated Server Messages [*]Custom Login Screen [*]God Wars Minigame [*]Barbarian Assualt Minigame [*]La'More Market Place [*]PVP Mode Switching [*]Extra Stability (Taken away uneeded material in process) [*]Ladders, Stairs, Doors, ext. [*]Cleaner NPC Dialogue [*]Monkey Island (Ape Atoll) Agility Course [*]Whip Gathering Minigame [*]Private Chat [*]Clan chat (Not completed, however interface added) [*]New Stats Interface [*]Mithril Seeds [/ul]
_____________________________________________ _____________________________________________
[B]Features Already Included, by Killamess:[/B]
[ul] [*]95% Bug Free Player VS Player Combat System [*]95% Bug Free Player VS NPC Combat System [*]65% Woodcutting [*]85% Firemaking [*]85% Runecrafting [*]95% Slayer [*]95% Agility [*]90% Fletching [*]90% Smithing [*]80% Mining [*]Decently Stable [*]Organized Packaging [*]Some more features, I cannot remember them. [/ul]
______________________________________________ ______________________________________________
[B]Videos[/B]
[b]Mithril Seeds[/b] [U][COLOR="Blue"][url=http://tinypic.com/r/s30pci/4][b]Watch Video[/b][/url][/COLOR][/U]
[b]Book Case Feature[/b] [U][COLOR="Blue"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ulTWstv4VM8][b]Watch Video[/b][/url][/COLOR][/U]
[b]Daggonoth Lair & More[/b] [U][COLOR="Blue"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ew18BDJJcA][b]Watch Video[/b][/url][/COLOR][/U]
[B]Images of Gameplay[/B]
[B]Mithril Seeds[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/mithrilseeds.png[/img]
[B]Monkey Island Demon Minigame[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/MonkeeIsland-1.png[/img]
[B]Barrows Minigame[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/barrows.png[/img]
[B]Bounty Hunter/PK Box Minigame[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/PKBox.png[/img]
[B]Staff Zone[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/LaStaffe_Inn.png[/img]
[B]Blurite Gathering Minigame[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/Winterborn.png[/img]
[B]Automated Server Messages[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/randommessages.png[/img]
[B]Custom Login Screen[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/welcomescreen.png[/img]
[B]PVP Mode Switching[/B]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/PVPSWITCH.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"][FONT="Comic Sans MS"][B]XileSoft, the Team[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
[B]Canownueasy (tgpn1996@hotmail.com):[/B] Supreme Leader, Head Programmer, Hoster, Income Collector [B]Maxxxx (whyjake99@hotmail.com):[/B] Leader, Head Programmer, Secondary Hoster, Graphics art [B]TodaysGeek/Nick (nicholas@nicksrunescape.com):[/B] Leader, Secondary Hoster, Income Manager [B]Heroxsword (josephchemor@hotmail.com):[/B] Helper, Beta Tester [B]Firewind (he doesn't want it here):[/B] Helper, Beta Tester [B]Fanz (fanz-@hotmail.com):[/B] Beta Tester [B]Santa A.K.A Lost-Souls (aarongodding1@hotmail.com):[/B] Programmer [B]Evan:[/B] Programmer [B]The Soul (the-soul1@hotmail.com):[/B] Programmer
[SIZE="5"][FONT="Comic Sans MS"][B]Join the Team[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
There are 4 ranks you can choose from.
Leader/Head Programmer, Programmer, Graphics artist, and Beta Tester.
Please make the applications as the following:
[b]Application for Leader/Head Programmer[/b] [code] [B]Applying for:[/B] Leader/Head Programmer [B]Hours a day you can work:[/B] [B]Proof you can program:[/B] [B]Degrees or formal graduate of programming:[/B] [B]Age:[/B] [B]First Name:[/B] [B]MSN/Yahoo:[/B] [B]Alias(username) in-game:[/B] [B]If leader, how much can you donate?[/B] [B]Other information:[/B] [/code]
[b]Application for Programmer[/b] [code] [B]Applying for:[/B] Programmer [B]Hours a day you can work:[/B] [B]Proof you can program:[/B] [B]Degrees or formal graduate of programming:[/B] [B]Age:[/B] [B]First Name:[/B] [B]MSN/Yahoo:[/B] [B]Alias(username) in-game:[/B] [B]Other information:[/B] [/code]
[b]Application for Graphics artist[/b] [code] [B]Applying for:[/B] Graphics artist [B]Example of work:[/B] [B]Age:[/B] [B]First Name:[/B] [B]MSN/Yahoo:[/B] [B]Alias(username) in-game:[/B] [B]Other information:[/B] [/code]
[b]Application for Beta Tester[/b] [code] [B]Applying for:[/B] Beta Tester [B]Hours a day you can test:[/B] [B]Age:[/B] [B]First Name:[/B] [B]MSN/Yahoo:[/B] [B]Alias(username) in-game:[/B] [B]Other information:[/B] [/code]

item.title: XileSoft - ONE OF A KIND (Better then ScapeRune)
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

xilesoft.png762×311

[SIZE=“5”][FONT=“Comic Sans MS”]Introduction[/FONT][/SIZE]

The XileSoft server is going to be great, because of it’s great base. Final Devolution 2.7 - by Killamess. With Final Devolution 2.7, includes all the files to start coding onto the se rver. Adding timers, delays, and other variables. It also includes a class Constants which you can configure different parts of the server. Inside this class you can also add your own variables. At XILESOFT INCORPORATE we strive to compete with the rest of the competetion, even Jagex. We can do this through creativity and getting every object, every npc, every button interactive with the user just like RuneScape.

[SIZE=“5”][FONT=“Comic Sans MS”]Features[/FONT][/SIZE]

Considering we strive for creativity, like said in the introduction, we will have many features in-game via interactive with limited bugs. Below lists some of the “creative features” we have added/will be adding.

The official XileSoft progress bar:

[SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Lime”]||||||||[/COLOR][COLOR=“Red”]||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Proof that we care: A staff needs to care about what they are programming. The code

default: p.sendMessage("Were not gonna add this crap."); break;

Is not caring. Caring means going through every individual object and writing a code for each. Something as simple as making the object say “The door seems to be stuck” or something as advanced as starting hundreds of timers and getting the perfect delay. We are already almost 10% done in about 2 days.

Never before seen… A server needs to have features that have never been added in another. Something that will attrack players toward your server instead of others. We have been working almost 24 hours straight on the project. Let us list our features that other servers don’t have.

Host

  • Windows Server 2003
  • 3.25GB RAM
  • 500GB Bandwith
  • Quad-Core Intel

Features Written by Me:

[ul]
[]Monkey Island
[]Monkey Island Demon’s Minigame
[]Barrows Minigame
[]Bounty Hunter Minigame (Formerally PK Box)
[]Staff Zone
[]Loads and loads of extras
[]Blurite Gathering Minigame
[]Automated Server Messages
[]Custom Login Screen
[]God Wars Minigame
[]Barbarian Assualt Minigame
[]La’More Market Place
[]PVP Mode Switching
[]Extra Stability (Taken away uneeded material in process)
[]Ladders, Stairs, Doors, ext.
[]Cleaner NPC Dialogue
[]Monkey Island (Ape Atoll) Agility Course
[]Whip Gathering Minigame
[]Private Chat
[]Clan chat (Not completed, however interface added)
[]New Stats Interface
[]Mithril Seeds [/ul]

Features Already Included, by Killamess:

[ul]
[]95% Bug Free Player VS Player Combat System
[]95% Bug Free Player VS NPC Combat System
[]65% Woodcutting
[]85% Firemaking
[]85% Runecrafting
[]95% Slayer
[]95% Agility
[]90% Fletching
[]90% Smithing
[]80% Mining
[]Decently Stable
[]Organized Packaging
[*]Some more features, I cannot remember them. [/ul]

Videos

Mithril Seeds
[COLOR=“Blue”]Watch Video[/COLOR]

Book Case Feature
[COLOR=“Blue”]Watch Video[/COLOR]

Daggonoth Lair & More
[COLOR=“Blue”]Watch Video[/COLOR]

Images of Gameplay

Mithril Seeds

Monkey Island Demon Minigame

MonkeeIsland-1.png445×610

Barrows Minigame

barrows.png759×502

Bounty Hunter/PK Box Minigame

PKBox.png760×499

Staff Zone

Blurite Gathering Minigame

Automated Server Messages

Custom Login Screen

PVP Mode Switching

PVPSWITCH.png516×501

[SIZE=“5”][FONT=“Comic Sans MS”]XileSoft, the Team[/FONT][/SIZE]

Canownueasy (tgpn1996@hotmail.com): Supreme Leader, Head Programmer, Hoster, Income Collector
Maxxxx (whyjake99@hotmail.com): Leader, Head Programmer, Secondary Hoster, Graphics art
TodaysGeek/Nick (nicholas@nicksrunescape.com): Leader, Secondary Hoster, Income Manager
Heroxsword (josephchemor@hotmail.com): Helper, Beta Tester
Firewind (he doesn’t want it here): Helper, Beta Tester
Fanz (fanz-@hotmail.com): Beta Tester
Santa A.K.A Lost-Souls (aarongodding1@hotmail.com): Programmer
Evan: Programmer
The Soul (the-soul1@hotmail.com): Programmer

[SIZE=“5”][FONT=“Comic Sans MS”]Join the Team[/FONT][/SIZE]

There are 4 ranks you can choose from.

Leader/Head Programmer, Programmer, Graphics artist, and Beta Tester.

Please make the applications as the following:

Application for Leader/Head Programmer

[B]Applying for:[/B] Leader/Head Programmer
